name: Thomas Hobbes
education: Hertford College, Oxford, St John's College, Cambridge (B.A., 1608)
influences: Plato, Aristotle, Thucydides, Cicero, Tacitus, William of Ockham, René Descartes, Hugo Grotius, Niccolò Machiavelli, Francis Bacon, Paolo Sarpi, Thomas White (scholar)
notable_ideas: Social contract, state of nature, ''bellum omnium contra omnes''
